page.title: 03 Farming
page.content: The farming in the area is mixed, arable with some pasture land for {sheep}and{cattle.}The crops grown are {sugar beet, oil seed rape, wheat,}and {potatoes.}Life on the farms is very different from the nineteenth century when children took time off school to help with the harvest. To stop this a {"never absent" board,}which hangs in the new school, encouraged the children to attend all year. Those who did, received{five shillings. {A farmer's wife}today gives more help with the running of the office business, keeping the books, dealing with telephone messages and the vast amount of paperwork. Old farm houses are still more difficult to keep clean but modern labour saving gadgets make it easier. Farm produced{meat, {vegetables}and{fruit}go into a deep freezer.
